name: Gemlic Grove
description:
Gemlic Grove is an endless dungeon-crawler inspired by Dark Souls, with a lick of resource management.

Created in 3 months with my mates for our final uni project, with me doing the game design, UI and programming.

Made in conjunction with @GarethYeap (Tech Artist, Environment Design/Developer, Art Director) and @bucchm (Animator, Character Design/Developer, Co-Tech Artist), whose works can be found on Twitter.

Special thanks to @mickkrek for creating the dithering shader for the trees.
